articles.title: Hey email cleared by App Store and is now open to all - TechRadar
articles.description: Email service Hey is no longer invite-only following battle with Apple
articles.content:
After being blocked from Apple's App Store, the new email service from Basecamp Hey is now available to download for iOS and iPadOS.
Hey was previously only available through an invite-only preview … [+1975 chars]
